about_the_game:
Purchase the Business Pass to get the gift pack instantly. Unlock Bonus rewards and get more when reaching higher Business levels.

Activate it for

Starter Gem ——20K Gold, 100 Gems(Diamonds)
Decoration ——Deer Fireplace
Exclusive Border——Avatar Border of Explorer
Cute Hero ——The Meow King Kuru II



Level up Business Plan to earn more rewards:


Eternal Prints——Collect Eternal Prints to activate Eternal Bonus for certain items
Mater Artisan ——Jeweler Karolin
New Hero ——Strange Doctor Hunt
Fresh Skin ——Katrina Beach Girl, Luca Summer Goddess，Eniet Cool Baby
Cute Pets ——Little Bee, Little Crocodile,Little Mouse, Calico cat(Skin)
Avatar Borders——Egypt Kitten, Fox Mask, Rose Border, Skilled Border
Furniture ——Golden Embed Chest, Shield of Guardian，Wooden Unicorn, Painting of the Starry Night, Luxury Piano,Phonograph, Parrot, Floor of light, Wallpaper of light
Legend Items ——Mysterious Scrolls, Legendary Bow-Bow of Stars, Mask of Reaper,Blade of Fate,Arm Cannon
Resources ——Diamonds, Crafting Gears&Wrenches, Chest keys, Gacha Tokens, EXP potions for heroes or artisan

package_groups.title: Buy Cadria Item Shop - Business Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Cadria Item Shop is a casual simulation game with fun plots. In the silent town you are just a shopkeeper to craft items and weapons for heroes. You can sell your items to heroes and complete orders to earn gold coins. By managing and developing your item shop you will help to reconstruct your hometown.
